document_data.name: Eler Had
document_data.refs2e: While not normally possible in 2{{nd}} edition rules, Eler was both a thief and a [[berserker]].
document_data.mainbody: '''Eler Had''' was a [[Bhaalspawn]] who joined the forces of [[Gromnir Il-Khan]] during the [[Bhaalspawn crisis]] of [[Tethyr]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possessions: He wore the powerful ''[[grandmaster's armor]]'' once worn by the great [[assassin]] [[Vita Muerte]].
document_data.History: When Saradush was under siege by [[Yaga-Shura]] in the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Eler remained with Gromnir Il-Khan while his forces barricaded themselves within the city's castle. He fought in Gromnir's last stand against their fellow Bhaalspawn [[Abdel Adrian]], and his adventuring companions.
